document_data.caption: Shind Road, between Voonlar and Yûlash. Click to enlarge.
document_data.name: Shind Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Shind Road''' was a travel route from [[Voonlar]] toward the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Geography: The road started in the town of Voonlar, where it split off of the [[North Ride]], and ran east to the town of [[Yûlash]].
